metadata.title: Xiaoyu - Frontend Developer & Tech Blogger
metadata.description: I'm Xiaoyu, a frontend developer and tech blogger focusing on modern web technologies with 1 year of experience, sharing frontend development insights and latest tech trends

hero.typedText: Frontend Developer, Tech Blogger, Open Source Enthusiast
hero.description: I focus on web frontend development and technical writing, sharing my experience and insights in programming. Through my blog, you can learn about the latest frontend technology trends and practical development tips.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Xiaoyu, Frontend Developer
about.description: With 1 year of frontend development experience, focusing on creating beautiful, efficient, and user-friendly web applications
about.intro1: Hello everyone, I'm Xiaoyu, a passionate frontend developer with 1 year of professional experience. I love the process of transforming designs into interactive digital experiences and believe that well-designed user interfaces can bring great value to users.
about.intro2: I'm proficient in modern frontend tech stack including React, Next.js, and TypeScript, and have a strong interest in UI/UX design. I'm enthusiastic about continuously learning new technologies and methods to improve my skills and create better user experiences.
about.intro3: Besides writing code, I also love sharing my knowledge and experience. Through my tech blog, I regularly publish articles, tutorials, and in-depth technical analysis about frontend development to help other developers improve their skills and solve common problems.

senior.company: Tech Planet Network Technology Co., Ltd.
senior.description: Responsible for frontend architecture design and implementation of core company products, optimizing user experience and performance, leading the frontend team in technological innovation.

frontend.description: Participated in the development of multiple large-scale web applications, responsible for responsive interface implementation and frontend performance optimization.

intern.description: Participated in frontend development of company products, learning and practicing frontend development technologies and best practices.

reactLibrary.title: React Component Library
reactLibrary.description: A lightweight UI component library based on React, providing 20+ common components with custom theme support.

nextjsTemplates.title: Next.js Template Collection
nextjsTemplates.description: Next.js project templates with integrated common features including authentication, data fetching, SEO optimization, etc.

vscodeExtension.title: VS Code Extension
vscodeExtension.description: VS Code extension to improve frontend development efficiency, supporting code snippet generation, file templates, and workflow automation.

openSource.title: Open Source Projects
openSource.description: I love the open source spirit and actively contribute to the open source community. Check out my GitHub to learn more about projects I'm involved in.

footer.tagline:
Frontend Developer & Tech Blogger
Focused on Web Development & UX Design

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Let's Create Something Together
contact.description: If you have any questions, suggestions, or collaboration opportunities, feel free to contact me. I'll reply to your message as soon as possible.

contact.subject: Subject

cta.title: Subscribe to My Tech Newsletter
cta.subtitle: Get Frontend Development Updates & Tutorials
cta.description: Every week I'll select the latest news, practical tips, and in-depth tutorials from the frontend development field to help you stay technically sharp and improve your development skills. Don't miss any important tech updates and practical experience.
cta.privacy: I respect your privacy, you can unsubscribe at any time.
cta.latestUpdates: Latest frontend framework and library updates
cta.practicalTips: Practical development tips and best practices
cta.performanceGuide: Performance optimization and UX improvement guides
cta.deepDive: In-depth technical articles and case studies
